definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: The magnolia liliflora is ingrained, load bearing marriage structure and family member's care.
sentences.chinese: 紫玉蘭根深蒂固，承載着婚姻的結構和親人的關心。

sentences.english: These nouns refer to the feeling or expression of deep-seated ill will.
sentences.chinese: 這些名詞指根深蒂固的惡意的感情或表述。

sentences.english: Russi a's sense of resurgence is mixed with a deeply rooted inferiority complex.
sentences.chinese: 復興俄羅斯的感情混合着一種根深蒂固的自卑感。

sentences.english: The American political system makes it hard to displace entrenched interest groups.
sentences.chinese: 美國的政治體制使得根深蒂固的利益集團難以被取代。

sentences.english: For some people, smoking is a deep-rooted habit.
sentences.chinese: 對某些人來說，抽菸是一個根深蒂固的習慣。

sentences.english: If a lie becomes entrenched it will be damaging.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個謊言變得根深蒂固，它會變得有害。

sentences.english: The preference for lighter skin and prejudice against dark-skinned people is deep-rooted in Chinese tradition.
sentences.chinese: 中國根深蒂固的傳統觀念推崇白人但瞧不起黑人。

sentences.english: It shows that the tradition of "honouring the teacher and respecting his teaching" is still deeply ingrained among Chinese teachers here.
sentences.chinese: 這反映了華文教育界尊師重道的傳統依然根深蒂固。

sentences.english: The aversion to spending is also deep-rooted.
sentences.chinese: 排斥消費也同樣根深蒂固。

sentences.english: Historically, there has been a lot of deep-seated prejudice against ethnically mixed people.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上，對種族混雜的人有許多根深蒂固的種族偏見。

sentences.english: In a traditional society, the concept and insistence on burial at ancestral site was deep-rooted.
sentences.chinese: 關於歸葬的觀念與實踐，在傳統社會中可謂根深蒂固。

sentences.english: I am already bound to rely on it. It's the way I am.
sentences.chinese: 我對它的依賴已經根深蒂固了，我就是這樣認爲的。

sentences.english: Rio resident Alexandre Oliveira says these problems run very deep.
sentences.chinese: 聖保羅居民奧利維拉說，這些問題已經根深蒂固。

sentences.english: There is a deep-seated conservatism running through our society.
sentences.chinese: 我們社會中普遍存在著根深蒂固的保守思想。

sentences.english: The idea bacame embedded in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 這想法在他頭腦中根深蒂固了。

definition: to be rooted to/to take root in
to regard men as superior to women (idiom)
